amendment.description: To increase Veterans medical services funding by $1.5 billion in FY 2007 to be paid for by closing corporate tax loopholes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3007 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 41.

action.text: Amendment SA 3007 proposed by Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S2078-2083, S2094-2095; text: CR S2079) To increase Veterans medical services funding by $1.5 billion in FY 2007 to be paid for by closing corporate tax loopholes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3007 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 41.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3007 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 41.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3007 proposed by Senator Akaka.
